articles.title: Evolution of neuronal cell classes and types in the vertebrate retina - Nature.com
articles.description: Single-cell and single-nucleus transcriptomic analysis of retina from 17 vertebrate species shows high conservation of retinal cell types and suggests that midget retinal ganglion cells in primates evolved from orthologous cells in ancestral mammals.
